snippet: Helicopters attacked camps and strongholds of Islamist militias on Monday in eastern Libya as part of a nearly three-week offensive by a renegade general.
abstract: Helicopters attack camps and strongholds of Islamist militias in eastern Libya as part of nearly three-week offensive led by renegade Gen Khalifa Hifter, leaving at least 18 people dead and sending civilians fleeing in panic.
lead_paragraph: Helicopters attacked camps and strongholds of Islamist militias on Monday in eastern Libya as part of a nearly three-week offensive by a renegade general.

headline.print_headline: Libya: Clashes Spread Panic in Benghazi
